    Welcome to Orcosa

    Modernizing the
    way     medicines
    are taken.

    Orcosa is focused on improving patient
    outcomes through our next generation
    drug delivery technology, the RITe™
    Platform.
    Rapid Infusion Technology™ (RITe) Platform
    With extremely rapid disintegration time, enhanced absorption profiles, and advanced flavor masking capabilities, the RITe™ Platform is a versatile technology that can enable a wide range of active ingredients to work quickly and efficiently in the body.
    Explore our platform

    RITe™ tablets dissolve in less than 3 seconds, rapidly infusing an active ingredient into the bloodstream through the tissue in your mouth.

    • Easy to take

      RITe™ tablets disintegrate rapidly, without the need for water

    • Fast action

      Effects are felt in minutes

    • Enhanced bioavailability

      Lower dose still achieves desired effects while reducing unwanted side effects

    • Durable, portable, and highly stable

      RITe™ tablets are compact, lightweight, and not sensitive to storage conditions

    See all benefits
    Our First Product Candidate: ORAVEXX™ (cannabidiol)

    Introducing a non-addictive alternative to opioids for moderate to severe post-surgical pain.

    Learn about ORAVEXX™
    Proprietary Manufacturing

    All RITe™ products are manufactured at our state of the art cGMP-compliant facility in New Jersey.

    Orcosa exclusively controls all applications of the RITe™ Platform. Our facility includes custom manufacturing machinery enabling seamless scaled manufacturing.
